title: Spinach and gorgonzola lasagne
ingredients: ['Bechamel Sauce', '50g unsalted butter', '50g plain flour', '600ml skimmed milk, hot or more if needed', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'Lasagne', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '750g fresh or frozen spinach', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt', 'freshly ground black pepper', '175g Gorgonzola cheese', '50g chopped walnuts', '12 lasagne sheets', '50g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
